<The Charing Cross Music Hall
beneath the arches of Charing Cross railway station
1:
--------------------
Text: Charing Cross Music Hall:  The site had been acquired, together with Hungerford Market, by the South Eastern Railway in 1862, and incorporated into the railway station, which opened on 11 January 1864, resulting in the demolition of the hall.
